subject: QATAR PETROLEUM
body:
QATAR PETROLEUM
P O Box 3212 Doha, Qatar.
Hello!
As - Salam-u- Alaikum.Your esteemed particulars were given to me by a diplomat who served under the auspices of foreign affairs commission, who assured me that you can handle a business of this magnitude. However, your profile instigated me to introduce my humble self. Vividly, i am H.E Ali Shareef Al Emadi Minister of finance Qatar
Petroleum (Formal).
(1) Business out stake. I have 60M to invest in Agriculture/Medical support's, lastly Real estates projects in your country.Please do not hesitate to contact me, if you are actually interested .Furthermore, I have all it would take to move the fund to any of your accounts designated as a contractual fund to avoid any security query by the
authorities in your country. note please reply to this  message with
my private mail (
healishareefa31@gmail.com
). More details would be given to you upon your response.
Thanks, have a pleasant time.
Sincerely
H.E Ali Shareef Al Emadi
+974-40139892

subject: Re:   QATAR PETROLEUM
body:
Hello Ali Shareef Al Emadi,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your kind words and the opportunity you have presented. I am definitely interested in learning more about the business venture you mentioned involving medical support and real estate projects.

Could you please provide me with some additional details about the investment? Specifically, I would like to know more about the nature of the projects, the expected returns, and any potential risks involved.

Also, it would be helpful if you could clarify how my involvement would be beneficial to both parties. What role would I play in this venture?

I look forward to hearing back from you with more information.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: QATAR PETROLEUM
body:
Attention  Barbara

Greetings from Qatar Shareef Al-Emad. Thank you for your prompt reply

Before I proceed to contact you, I prayed to Allah to guide and direct me
to an honest and trustworthy man or group of individuals that can assist me
in this business deal. As the man in the helm of affairs of Qatar
petroleum, I have implicit confidence in  Allah, who has guided/directed me
to you, and trust in your ability to partner with me, confidentially in
this business deal, for mutual disbursement or to invest wisely for profit
oriented venture, when the fund is transferred to you. Having said the
above, my dear friend, I will not hesitate in telling you more details and
the source of the fund.

Actually, this US$60 Million was acquired from an over-invoiced contracts
that was executed by foreign contractors in state Qatar, and the Contracts
has been perfectly executed and the original contractors, and their
contract sums fully paid, and the over invoiced still in the vault of Qatar
Petroleum I need your assistance to move this over invoiced fund into any
of your account, as I am going to present you as a contractor that has not
been paid of this over invoiced sum.

To achieve this, we will first register your name/company as Category 'A'
Contractor with the Qatar Petroleum and use the registration Certificate to
procure all the necessary contract documents (Contract Award and Completion
Certificates) which shall be submitted to my office for approval and
payment, As all these document will back-dated to suit our request.

We are going to follow all due processes to achieve this goal
(Documentations) and you will appreciate it as we progress. Thereafter the
documentations, I will approve and order for immediate payment and transfer
of the fund into your designated bank account through any of your bank
accounts either in your country or outside. Thus, I will want you to send
the following information to me for the documentation at the Qatar
Financial Center.

Note . You will have 25% of the $60m upon the receipt in your bank account.
5% will cover all local and international contingencies that might arise on
the process of the transfer to your account.  While my 70% will be invested
in your Company pending on my retirement to meet with you. You have to
guide me on the area that I will invest my own part of the fund in your
country. On this note you have to help me look out for a profitable
business  that I am going to invest my part of the fund in. Please note
that this transaction is 100% genuine and legal and has nothing to do with
scam and will never be part of scam.

1. your company name or the name you would want to be used as the company
that executed the contract with Qatar petroleum that has not been paid by
Qatar Petroleum. While I wait for your prompt and urgent reply with any of
your ID. I will register your name or company name as a contractor with the
QP to secure every contract document that will empower you to receive the
fund as a contract payment. I have a powerful Attorney here that will
handle the documents. Meanwhile, I have decided to remit the funds with the
idea that we can have a deal/agreement and I am going to do this legally.My
conditions are:

1. The sum of US$60M will be transferred to your Account.
2. This deal must be kept secret forever and all correspondence will
be strictly by email and telephone for security purposes.

3. There should be no third part in this Deal.
Waiting for your urgent response.
H.E Ali Shareef Al-Emad

subject: Re: QATAR PETROLEUM
body:
Dear Ali Shareef,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing all the details about this business deal. I appreciate your trust in me and your confidence in my ability to assist you. Before we proceed further, I would like to ask a few questions to better understand the situation.

1. Can you please provide more information about the contracts that were executed by foreigners in Qatar? What kind of contracts were they and how were they related to Qatar Petroleum?

2. How did you come across this over invoiced fund? Is it a common occurrence in such contracts?

3. Could you explain the process of registering my name or company name as a Category 'A' Contractor with Qatar Petroleum? What are the requirements and how long does it usually take?

4. You mentioned that there will be due processes followed for the transfer of funds into my designated bank account. Could you elaborate on these processes and any legal requirements involved?

5. As for investing your own part of the fund, what are your preferences or areas of interest? Are there any specific industries or sectors you would like to explore?

I look forward to receiving your response and discussing this opportunity further.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: QATAR PETROLEUM
body:
Greetings from Qatar.
Thanks for your question and i will like to answer step by step.

1. Can you please provide more information about the contracts that were
executed by foreigners in Qatar? What kind of contracts were they and how
were they related to Qatar Petroleum?

Answer: The Contract was for Supply/ Reconstruction of Oil Pipe line,
laying & Expension (TAM ) Contraction  Construction of Bridges Carriage for
Medium Lifting.

2. How did you come across this over invoiced fund? Is it a common
occurrence in such contracts?

Answer: The contract was over-invoiced by foreign firm  based on the
 agreement with the top functionaries. Therefore, the over invoice sum  is
still with the Qatar Petroleum/ Energy account wait for approval for
disbursement.

3. Could you explain the process of registering my name or company name as
a Category 'A' Contractor with Qatar Petroleum? What are the requirements
and how long does it usually take?

Answer; We are register your company's as an already existing firm  and
back all the details to suit our claims, This process will be done through
the accrediate account to the who know everything process and procedure,
but it cost us money. Because Qataris believed in give and take.

4. You mentioned that there will be due processes followed for the transfer
of funds into my designated bank account. Could you elaborate on these
processes and any legal requirements involved?

Answer: We are going follow the due diligence as to avoid any encumbrance
from any Government policies,  by registering you companies geuniely and
obtain the Company Registration certCertificas a registered contract  with
Qatar Petroleum and  Contract Award Certificate and  all the government
legal   document to proof that your actually the original contractor.

5. As for investing your own part of the fund, what are your preferences or
areas of interest? Are there any specific industries or sectors you would
like to explore?

Answer: my own part of the funds will be invested in any  relible venture
that will profitable for both of us  i.e Charity/ Foundation and  Real
Estate/ Medical Supply.
Best Regards,
H.E.Ali Shareef Al-Emadi

subject: Re: QATAR PETROLEUM
body:
Hello Shareef,

Thank you for reaching out to me from Qatar. I appreciate your willingness to answer my questions. 

Regarding the contracts executed by foreigners in Qatar, could you please provide more details about the specific types of contracts that were involved? And how were these contracts related to Qatar Petroleum?

I'm also curious about how you came across this over invoiced fund. Is it a common occurrence in such contracts? 

Furthermore, I would like to understand the process of becoming a Category 'A' Contractor with Qatar Petroleum. What are the requirements and how long does it usually take?

You mentioned that there will be due processes followed for the transfer of funds into my designated bank account. Could you please elaborate on these processes and any legal aspects involved?

Lastly, if I were to invest my own part of the fund, what areas or industries would you recommend? Are there any specific sectors that you believe would be profitable for both of us?

Thank you again for your time and assistance.

Best wishes,
Barbara

body:

subject: Re: I have answered all your question before
body:
Hello Shareef,

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with this information. I appreciate your willingness to answer my questions. 

Regarding the contracts executed by foreigners in Qatar, could you please provide more details about the specific types of contracts that were involved? How were these contracts related to Qatar Petroleum?

I'm also curious about how you came across this over invoiced fund. Is it a common occurrence in contracts like these? 

Furthermore, I would like to understand the process of being registered as a Category 'A' Contractor with Qatar Petroleum. Could you explain the steps involved and how long it usually takes?

Barbara

subject: Re: I have answered all your question before
body:
Thanks for your response i will  like to have your telephone number as soon
as possible
Thanks
Shareef,

subject: Re: I have answered all your question before
body:
Hello Shareef,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm glad to hear that you're interested in sharing your telephone number with me. However, before we proceed, could you please let me know a bit more about why you would like to share your telephone number? I just want to make sure I understand the purpose of it.

Best wishes,
Barbara
